main.description: GohanGo!! is a programmatic generated NFT collection on the Solana blockchain. There will be 8,866 unique digital collectibles in total.

promo.title:
Made By
Rice Lover
promo.description: Rice feed more than half of the world's population. We want to share our love to rice with the you.

promo.title:
Community
First
promo.description: Always start with the community, building and respecting our community is the #1 thing of GohanGo!!. We believe together we can make the word a little bit different.

promo.title: Something Different
promo.description: We don't want to be yet another NFT project, we want to be "the" NFT project. We want to support.
